main event: A couple observed a pale blue, oval-shaped object while at a drive-in movie in Alamogordo, New Mexico on October 7, 1952.
interesting points: The object traveled east in a straight line before fading out., The sighting lasted about 6 years in total., The observer described the object as 30 to 40 feet in diameter., The object appeared metallic and displayed a sudden change in direction., The couple initially thought it might be a planet but dismissed that idea due to its unusual movement.
witness description: First Lieutenant in the Air Force and his wife
